citations.narrative:
An irregularly shaped @5x3.5 inch hole was present in the wood around the door of the cavy and wallaby shelter. The
hole may present an entrance for rodent pests that may carry disease or contaminate feed. The facility must ensure that
the enclosure is maintained in good repair.
Correct by 28 February 2025

The African crested porcupine is being kept overnight inside in a travel crate, which does not allow for normal ambulation
or stretching, although during daylight hours, the animal is housed in an outside exercise yard. Lack of adequate space
for overnight housing may lead to abnormal behavior and debilitation. The facility must ensure that the overnight housing
gives the animal enough space for adequate freedom of movement.
Correct by February 25, 2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.125(a) 
   
Facilities, general. 
An irregularly shaped @5x3.5 inch hole was present in the wood around the door of the cavy and wallaby shelter. The 
hole may present an entrance for rodent pests that may carry disease or contaminate feed. The facility must ensure that 
the enclosure is maintained in good repair. 
 
Correct by 28 February 2025 
3.128 
   
Space requirements. 
The African crested porcupine is being kept overnight inside in a travel crate, which does not allow for normal ambulation 
or stretching, although during daylight hours, the animal is housed in an outside exercise yard. Lack of adequate space 
for overnight housing may lead to abnormal behavior and debilitation. The facility must ensure that the overnight housing 
gives the animal enough space for adequate freedom of movement. 
 
Correct by February 25, 2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
 n
